definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be soft, delicate, dainty (NH id. Pi. make soft, pliable, live or spend in enjoyment; Ar. ganija use amorous behaviour, affect langour);—

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. f. [[הַמְּעֻנׇּגׇה]] Je 6:2 daintily bred, fig. of Jerusalem.

definitions.title: Hithp. 1.
definitions.body: be of dainty habit, Inf. cstr. [[הִתְעַנֵּג]] De 28:56 (woman, ‖[[רׂךְ]]).

take exquisite delight, Pf. 3 pl. [[וְהִתְעַנְּגוּ]] consec Ps 37:11 ([[עַל]] rei); 2 mpl. [[וְהִתְעַנַּגְתֶּם]] consec. Is 66:11 ([[מִן]] rei); Impf. 3 ms. [[יִתְעַנׇּ֑ג]] Job 27:10; 2 ms. [[תִּתְעַנַּג]] Is 58:14, [[תִּתְעַנׇּ֑ג]] Job 22:26 (all c. [[[שַׁדַּי]]] ´[[עַל־י]]); 3 fs. [[תִּתְעַנַּג]] Is 55:2 ([[ב]] rei); Imv. ms. ´[[הִתְעַנַּג עַל־י]] Ps 37:4.
c. [[עַל]], in bad sense, make merry over, make sport of, Impf. 2 mpl. [[עַל־מִי תִּתְעַנׇּ֑גוּ]] Is 57:4.
